page.title: 18HOME LIFE
page.content: Nearly every home has a{washing {machine, fridge and colour T.V.}Half the children have a{home computer}but only 5% have a{piano.Video recorders and{microwave ovens}are becoming popular with about half the families owning one or both.Most families have a{pet.}The most popular are cats and then dogs and fish.Dolls,and action men are favourite{toys}but board games and electronic toys are popular.The majority of girls prefer wearing skirts to trousers but all the children like jeans and track suits for casual wear.Trainers are popular footwear for children.Main{meals}are usually taken in the evenings and eaten together as a family.Where possible most families eat a traditional roast dinner on Sundays at mid-day but during the week conveniece foods,especially chips,are common.
